name: Friends and Heroes
description:
You're trapped in a cave. Find your way out in this procedurally generated cave. If you're lucky, you will find a friend or 2 to help you out.

You can also play with a buddy in dynamic split screen mode. Maps are bigger in coop mode.

Keyboard Controls:
Space = Jump (jump in air), Glide (in air)
A = Left
D = Right
S = Look Down
W = Look up
F = Dash (can be used in air)
P = Switch characters (if available)
W, A, S, D = Aim
Left Mouse Button = Shoot/Attack
Left Shift = Sprint/Run (hold)

Coder: Akusan and Fixx
Artist: ManuGamesDev
